name: thermoelectric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or involving electricity that is produced by applying heat to something, often two different metals that absorb the heat differently: The car has a thermoelectric generator, which converts heat to electricity, fitted in the exhaust system. Two ageing thermo-electric power plants spew out smoke over the city. Several articles have been published about the thermoelectrical behaviour of aluminium electrolytic cells.
More examplesFewer examplesMaintenance problems at two of the region's thermoelectric power plants were blamed for the blackouts.With better thermoelectric materials available to produce more electricity, you might eventually be able to reduce fuel consumption. The spacecraft is powered by a thermo-electric generator.
